title: News App - News Dekho
desc: As a React JS developer, I built a news web application that displays the latest news category-wise by fetching data from the News API.

title: Disney+ clone
stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJs, Styled Componenets, Redux, Firebse.
desc: This clone replicates the beloved Disney+ streaming platform, offering a visually appealing user interface, seamless content streaming, and secure authentication through Firebase.

title: QR Ticket Booking App
stack: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, ReactJs, Tailwind CSS, ExpressJs, MongoDB, NodeJs.
desc: The QR ticket booking app is a user-friendly platform that allows users to login, make secure payments, and generate QR codes for ticket metro tickets for Red line stations.

title: Text Editor
desc: In text Editor you can remove extra spaces, count word, character and spaces, convert to lowercase and uppercase, clear text and etc.

title: Weather website
desc: This website show the weather details of different cities, it fetch the details from an API. It show the data dynamically as we enter the city.
